attributes.action: Make it illegal for anyone unrelated to a human under 16 to take photos of them.
attributes.additional_details: It would protect children's privacy, and it might prevent individuals under the age of 16 from having their photos posted on the internet against their will.
attributes.background: I want it to be illegal for non-relatives of individuals under 16 to take photos of them without their or their parents' permission.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637556
